challenges.instruction: If you had to enforce one of these rules in your home, which would it be?
answers: Everyone must hop instead of walking.
All conversations must start with a joke.
Every meal must be eaten with chopsticks, including soup.

challenges.instruction: If you had to choose one of these unsettling habits to develop permanently, which would you pick and why?
answers: Sniffing strangers' hair in public without explanation.
Collecting and displaying your own toenail clippings in your living room.
Randomly yelling out the first thought that comes to your mind during serious conversations.

End the relationship immediately.
